item.title: Players can wear donor items :/
item.dc:creator: @scenemo scenemo
item.description:
@scenemo wrote:

this is what i have in my itemassistant.java

*Wear Item **/ public boolean wearItem(int wearID, int slot) { synchronized(c) { int targetSlot=0; boolean canWearItem = true; if (( wearID ==3273 || wearID==7927 || wearID==4565 || wearID==4084 || wearID==7675) && (c.playerRights > 2)) { c.sendMessage("You need to be a Donator for this Item.."); return false; }

anything wrong?
